head.title: Full-stack developer and innovation enthusiast
head.paragraph: Over 5 years of experience in the tech industry. I specialize in building innovative web and mobile applications using technologies such as React, React Native, and Node.js.

about.title: I’m a passionate software developer looking for my first international opportunity
about.paragraph: Beyond coding, I’m a Lego enthusiast, a dog lover, and a self-taught designer who enjoys spending my free time learning something new. I am currently seeking opportunities to bring my skills and enthusiasm to a tech company in the United States or Europe and am excited about the prospect of relocating to pursue new challenges.

contact.title: Enjoyed my work? Let’s work together
contact.paragraph1: I’m always up for a chat. Pop me an email at
contact.paragraph2: or give me a shout on social media.
